name: Extreme Bike Trail Rivals
description:
Extreme Bike Trail Rivals is one of the best Moto GP stunt racing game in difficult stunt area without road rash game. Bike stunts are a racing and action game in which bike riders and extreme bike stunt with thrilling mission. This game control is design by very unique great controls makes Bike race very exciting and nice time killer!
Realistic stunt ramps and stunts
Ultra Smooth and intelligent control
Multiple Realistic physics based dirt bikes
Unique, rough and dangerous stunts
Beautiful 3D graphics and amazing environment
Challenging stunts game-play
Very easy to play
